EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.DC Invite - 2/5/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Hey DC Area! We’re extending this SpringOne Tour discount just for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As a member of the greater D.C.–area tech community, we'd love to connect with you at this year's SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/washington-dc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1t-dc-2019]]>, a Java developer community event. Over the course of 2 days, the community will share presentations and participate in open discussions about all things Spring. Oh, and you’ll hear about related technologies like Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry, Concourse, and RabbitMQ too!
Register now to receive $50 off your ticket!
The event will take place at the Convene in Arlington, VA on February 19-20. Please use discount code S1Tour2019_DC100 for $50 off your ticket. Don’t miss this opportunity to learn from and share with members of the open source community.
>>>Register Now <[[https://springonetour.io/register?city=washington-dc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1t-dc-2019]]>
Please confirm your attendance by registering above, tickets are easy to manage at $100.00 USD after your discount.
We hope to see you there!
The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
